description:
Lightweight trekking comfort for your feet – the Tatra Light GTX combines Hanwag’s traditional and proven expertise with the latest advances in modern bootmaking technology. It’s built around its lightweight, sturdy sole unit. Its designed to allow the foot to sit lower in the boot so that the sole gives additional grip and stability on rugged trails. Perfect for easier hikes with a light pack. And thanks to the waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX lining, this superb all-rounder will keep your feet reliably dry in all conditions.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Tatra Light GTX - Mens
